question: Which Atlanta Braves pitcher won the Cy Young Award in both the 1991 and 1998 seasons, becoming one of the few players to achieve this feat multiple times?
raw_content:
Question: Which Atlanta Braves pitcher won the Cy Young Award in both the 1991 and 1998 seasons, becoming one of the few players to achieve this feat multiple times?  
Answer: Greg Maddux.
